pretty-hrtime
============

[process.hrtime()](http://nodejs.org/api/process.html#process_process_hrtime) to words

Usage
-----

```javascript
var prettyHrtime = require('pretty-hrtime');

var start = process.hrtime();
// do stuff
var end = proces
